import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './ProductDisplay.css'; import star_icon from "../Assets/star_icon.png"; import star_dull_icon from "../Assets/star_dull_icon.png"; import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const { product } = props; const { addToCart, convertPrice, currency, currencySymbol } = useContext(ShopContext); // Convert prices based on selected currency const convertedOldPrice = convertPrice(product.old_price, currency); const convertedNewPrice = convertPrice(product.new_price, currency); return (

{product.name}

(122)

{currencySymbol} {convertedOldPrice}
{currencySymbol} {convertedNewPrice}
A lightweight, usually knitted, pullover shirt, close-fitting and with a round neckline and short sleeves, worn as an undershirt or outer garment.

Select Size

S
M
L
XL
XXL

Category : Women, T-Shirt, Crop Top

Tags : Modern, Latest

); }; export default ProductDisplay;
